en_text: Fate can be changed
jp_text: 夢のままじゃない

en_text: I can't explain it, but
jp_text: 上手く伝えきれないけど
google_translated: I can not tell you well

en_text: Can you let me borrow that notebook?
jp_text: 良かったら　あのノート貸してもらえるかな
google_translated: If you like, I wonder if that note can be lent
